name: AIaW (NitroRCr)
description: [项目级] AI as Workspace - An elegant AI chat client. Full-featured, lightweight. Support multiple workspaces, plugin system, cross-platform, local first + real-time cloud sync, Artifacts, MCP | 更好的 AI 客户端。来源: https://github.com/NitroRCr/AIaW

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
AI as Workspace - An elegant AI chat client. Full-featured, lightweight. Support multiple workspaces, plugin system, cross-platform, local first + real-time cloud sync, Artifacts, MCP | 更好的 AI 客户端

来源: https://github.com/NitroRCr/AIaW
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 1750

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
- Support for MCP Tools, Prompts, Resources
- STDIO and HTTP connection methods
- Install MCP-type plugins from the plugin marketplace or manually add MCP servers
